thread.title: Stuart
thread.title_full: The Shower Doctor Ltd reviewed by Stuart

author: Stuart
title: Stuart
text: Ordered with payment. Part not in stock at the time, had to phone for update. Part was not delivered, no offer to chase royal mail told I had to. Will reimburse me only on receipt back to them. Had to repurchase another part which I received the next day. So l have payed for two but received one. Out of pocket, not such a good deal so far.
